{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.17711v1", "title": "Study on P-Type Doping of Mid-Wave and Long-Wave Infrared Mercury
  Cadmium Telluride", "summary": "We present in depth study of p-type doping concentration of mid-wave infrared
(MWIR) and long-wave infrared (LWIR) mercury cadmium Telluride (HgCdTe) thin
films. Annealing time was changed under specific conditions to achieve a stable
copper (Cu) doping concentration for HgCdTe thin films. Both MWIR and LWIR
HgCdTe material were grown by molecular beam epitaxy (MBE), where different
trends were observed between LWIR and MWIR HgCdTe thin films by increasing
anneal time. We also report the impact of different thickness (4 micron, 6
micron and 9 micron) along with annealing time on doping level of LWIR HgCdTe
thin films.", "main_category": "cond-mat.mtrl-sci", "categories": "cond-mat.mtrl-sci,physics.app-ph", "published": "2025-04-24T16:14:33Z"}
